UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Bactericidal activity of LFchimera is stronger and less sensitive to ionic strength than its constituent lactoferricin and lactoferrampin peptides.
Literature.Author: Bolscher JG, Adao R, Nazmi K, van den Keybus PA, van 't Hof W, Nieuw Amerongen AV, Bastos M, Veerman EC

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Aggregatibacter actinomycetemcomitans ATCC 43718(LC50=5.1µM),Streptococcus mutans Ingbritt(LC50=1.3µM),Streptococcus mutans Ingbritt(LC50=1.6µM),Streptococcus sanguinis SK4(LC50=1.4µM),Streptococcus sanguinis SK4(LC50=1.5µM),Escherichia coli K-12(LC50=2.7µM),Escherichia coli K-12(LC50=5.0µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAK(LC50=0.9µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAK(LC50=1.2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(LC50=1.5µM)
